question: Which of the following was known as ‘Abhinava Bhoja’, ‘Andhra Pitamah’, ‘Andhra Bhoja'?
explanation: Krishna Deva Raya who ruled from 1509 to 29 CE was the greatest of the Vijayanagar rulers. He was also known as ‘Abhinava Bhoja’, ‘Andhra Pitamah’, ‘Andhra Bhoja’. Krishna Deva Raya was a great patron of literature and art.
